descriptionHTML:
Send a cat to space? Play in zero gravity? Easy! With this animated, customizable watch face you can do it all, right on your wrist.

Gamer’s Space is a fun little watch face with unique gravity simulation feature. Responds to the position of your smartwatch and sends objects into a free flight.

Attention! Outer space is not a place for real kitties.

🌟Main features:
- Gravity simulation;
- Rotating background with a sky full of stars;
- Alternative light background option
- Optional illuminator;
- Add or remove a gamepad;
- Optional coffee cup with flying drops;
- Space cat in all his animated glory (optional too).

⌚Is it for me?
Gamer’s Space is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 3;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG Watch Style;
✔ LG Watch Sport;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ Huawei Watch 2;
✔ Polar M600;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, Samsung Gear S2 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Gamer’s Space Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Not sure if ready to buy? Try out this watch face in our Collection app for free! - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.boost.watchcore 🙊
comments: Prefect watch face Absolutely Love the features and options.  The face is elegant, cool and battery friendly.  A Must have
Blinky floating space cat! Everybody needs a Blinky floating space cat watch face! Love it
